If I understand your post.....the zipper teeth are fine but the sliders are damaged?   Replacement sliders (single or double sided) can be purchased at your local fabric/sewing store.  When a zipper is closed there are tabs at the end to stop the slider.  To replace, snip off the tabs, pull off old slider, replace with a new slider, attach new tabs (usually in package).  If there are not any replacement tabs in the package, they can also be purchased separately.   Good luck!
